00036 require_once('../lib/vars.php');

00039 class Smtpgated extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'smtp-gated';
00042     public $Layout= 'smtp-gated';
00043     
00044     function Smtpgated()
00045     {
00046         $this->LogsHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('You may want to watch these logs carefully to determine infected clients in the internal network.');
00047         $this->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('If an outgoing e-mail is determined to be infected or identified as spam, the client trying to send that e-mail is blocked from sending any e-mails for a period of time defined by lock duration. You can enter your e-mail address in report e-mail option.');
00048         
00049         $this->Config = array(
00050             'lock_on' => array(

00110     function FormatLogCols(&$cols)
00111     {
00112         $cols['Log']= wordwrap(htmlspecialchars($cols['Log']), 80, '<br />', TRUE);
00113         $cols['Sender']= htmlspecialchars($cols['Sender']);
00114         $cols['Recipient']= htmlspecialchars($cols['Recipient']);
00115     }
00116 }
